pkgmetadata.longdescription: Portable Emissions (and Other Mobile) Measurement System Utilities // Utility functions for the handling, analysis and visualisation of data from portable emissions measurement systems ('PEMS') and other similar mobile activity monitoring devices. The package includes a dedicated 'pems' data class that manages many of the quality control, unit handling and data archiving issues that can hinder efforts to standardise 'PEMS' research.
